title: Unify Progress Comparison option banner with slot card container

requirements.summary: Make each Progress Comparison slot’s “Option {1|2|3}” banner visually integrated with its card so it starts at the card’s rounded top edge with no gap.
acceptanceCriteria: In the Progress Comparison modal side-by-side view, each slot’s Option banner visually touches the top edge of its card (no empty band/gap above the banner).
The card’s top-left/top-right rounded corners are visually applied to the unified header/banner area (the banner appears integrated into the same rounded container).
No layout regressions to the slot header content (date line, Today-relative variance badge, Change button) and the image area below.
The change applies consistently to Option 1, Option 2, and Option 3.

file_operations.description: Adjust the slot header/banner container styling so the Option banner extends to the card’s top edge and inherits the card’s rounded top corners (e.g., add top rounding to the banner area and remove any perceived inset by aligning the banner to the card border). Ensure the date/variance badge and Change button layout stays unchanged.
